website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, fairly inexpensive pair of Nike thong sandals that look good with numerous casual summer styles; but they also come with some quality issues.
pros: Available in numerous attractive color options
Flip-flop-style thongs have dual-density midsoles that some wearers have compared to "walking on air."
Toe piece is soft and comfortable
cons: A few owners report durability concerns including early signs of wear and broken straps
Arch support and structure could be better

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as the other style of Nike Comfort sandal
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 styles of the Nike Comfort Sandal. One of them has a perforated upper, and the other (this one being reviewed) does not. The one with the perforated upper is much more comfortable. That one is a heavier sandal, more comfortable thong between your toes, and more padding. This sandal that I'm reviewing is uncomfortable between my toes, has stiffer padding (therefore less comfortable), and lightweight sole. If I had not tried the other style first, I'd probably say this sandal is ok other than blistering between my toes. But now I know spend a little more and get the other style.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tremko - Author of The DIY Spa Retreat

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, and I miss my old pair
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these that I wore for a couple of years, and they finally broke at the end of summer last year. I purchased this new pair in the spring to replace the broken pair. Same style/size, but these feel cheaper. The memory foam started to break down in the heel, and I'm not a heavy person. Today the thong part of the sandal snapped, and I had to stitch it together with fishing line to wear them home. Very disappointed, and I miss my old pair :(
customer_reviews.author: Tootsieowl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.......
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a pair and the piece between the toes broke. Thought it might a fluke so I bought another pair.....same thing happened. Both broke within a seasons worth of wear. Finally just went with another brand. Won’t buy these again or recommend these to anyone. Expected better from Nike.
customer_reviews.author: patricia anderson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if large or wider feet. They feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate size. Very small, narrow and VERY CHEAP imho. Do not advise to buy if you wear larger than 11 as 12 is an 11.... I'll keep but only because I can't find the one is I have that are true 12 woman.... Disappointed. Very uncomfortable as I'm trying to stretch them knowing it will make them break quicker. My old ones are 2 years old and still holding up but beaten up. I doubt these will last until Thanksgiving... See photos to compare my older pair is a gray color.
customer_reviews.author: Mlspirit

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last one WI summer
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I bought these for a trip in February 2018. Wore them 8 days. Then summer came and a week in the strap snapped from the pad. No way to fix it and too late to return since bought in winter for a trip. Nike, I expected better:(
customer_reviews.author: Charles Brinkly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Right foot toe thong broke the first time i wore them. 2nd pair this happened to in 6 months. I love them for comfort but just not sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Eh.... It's not much better than my 1.00 flip flops.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm pretty disappointed in them. I was hoping to wear them to an amusement park instead of tennis shoes, but I really don't think that they will work for me. I usually wear a 9/10 in the $1.00 flip flops from walmart, and they tend to run pretty big for me. I have lots of flipping room....I ordered a 10 in these to give myself lots of room...well thank goodness. My feet take up the ENTIRE thing. There is NO extra room either at the toes or the heel. I am pretty product loyal, and for being Nike, I am pretty disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay millikin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and worse sandal ever...Poor material... going down the stairs they broke and hurt my arm... very disappointing...I bought this in April...2 months lasted!!!!
customer_reviews.author: xandra

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this sandal. This is my second pair as I wore the other ones out over the course of 5 years. Love the bright pink with the black. Just don't wear with wet feet, because they will start to smell bad and washing them doesn't take the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Dodi Jensen

customer_reviews.title: To stiff does not wear in just wears out quickly
customer_reviews.text: My wife didn't like these they where a little stiff and instead of breaking in they just broke. They were never comfortable for her to wear. Sometimes when using new flip-flops she will get a little rubbing for a day or 2 but these gave her 3 different blisters day one that where covered up with small band-aids designed for that but then they didn't get to a week before they just broke. Was not to small materials are just far to stiff to start out with
customer_reviews.author: Justin  L

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cushiony
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought a 10 instead of a 9, since I normally wear a 9.5. Nevertheless, they're fine. I have no padding on the bottom of my feet naturally, so these are great.Wore out one pair already. You'll find out where your pressure points are, because they will wear down first and make holes. I wore mine, though, until I replaced them for the cosmetic factor. They were still comfortable--just ugly. It does take quite awhile to wear down. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lilacblue

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Nike Ultra Comfort Thong Sandal and I just love them. I normally were Crocs because I seem to be loosing my balance easily the older I get. I were my Nike thongs only when I have a pedicure, I so miss not wearing them more often. I finally broke down bought another pair of Nikes and because of the tight fit they hug my feet and I don't slip around like other flip flops and these have the added cushion to make them even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Roseyred

customer_reviews.title: More form than function
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pairs of these that are older. They have leather uppers instead of the fabric ones on these. I have to say this new design does not hold a candle to the older ones. They are still squishy but the top stretch so much that the shoes become quite big on you after a while. I had to buy a replacement pair in 2 months because it was so loose that my foot slipped slideways and the top ripped right out! Not a fan of the new ones. I won't buy another pair. That said, they are easy to slip on and off and convenient for a casual every day sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Twice broken
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a Christmas gift and I loved them. However, after 2 weeks, the thong strap broke. I sent them back to Amazon and received a new pair. I've only been using the new pair about a month and I just noticed the strap is barely hanging on, about to break again. I am no longer eligible for an exchange. Unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Duke4568

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PAIR OF NIKE FLIP FLOPS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I almost never give ratings, but this timeI has to so someone ekeae doesn’t make the same mistake as me, I wish I would have read the reviews on this pair of flip flops, this has to be by far the worst buy ever I bought a size 10 and it feels like it’s a size 6, my foot wouldn’t even go in, very poorly constructed, cheap looking. Complete waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: FAKE UNAUTHENTIC NIKE SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: This is a knockoff product by Nike. I've gotten the same pair multiple times at Famous Footware but bought them here because they were not in store. The cushion is not padded like the original, very flat and sinks. The thong is sharp and it digs under the big toe when walking, my toes were swollen after 30 minutes of wear around the house. Please save your money and get the ACTUAL shoes in store or by a different store online.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals! I have now bought four pairs in different colors. They fit well, have a non-slip sole, and have an incredibly comfortable memory foam insole. I hope Nike makes these forever! They are also very well constructed and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, they brake within a month.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my Mother for Christmas because the pair that she currently had were old and worn out. She immediately wore them the moment she received them. They were very comfortable but only after a week she said they were getting loose. Well today, roughly 40 days later the right foot sandal thong snapped off and the left foot's strap does not look so well either. It is worth noting that my mother is a diabetic and due to pain caused by wearing anything that covers her right foot she wore these all 40 days.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I live in these!
customer_reviews.text: I live in flip-flops, but regular flip-flops give me a back-ache after walking in them for awhile. The ones with memory foam in the soles - like these - don't give me back aches and so I've been buying them for years. I wear them daily all spring/summer/autumn long and a pair usually lasts me at least one year.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable but the quality has changed dramatically. Extremely disappointed in the material of the uppers. I have had these for 2 weeks and only wear them inside my house (as slippers) and they are falling apart at the top where the toe piece meets. The stitching has broken and the fabric material has also begun to rip on both shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: TIME WILL TELL
customer_reviews.text: A side by side comparison of the original, used pair, to this new one, shows a different manufacturing process and the materials are also different with the original pair having a softer more pliable surface, somewhat heavier with better quality than this new pair. Time will tell whether this new pair, lighter and seemingly simpler in build, will wear as well as the original.
customer_reviews.author: csxcobra

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE COMFORTABLE CUTE
customer_reviews.text: These were my daughter's favorite shoes. She wore them absolutely everywhere for about a year and a half, when the part between the toes started to get threadbare on one shoe. We live in Florida, so I'm serious when I say she gave these shoes a good workout for 18 months! She loved them. They were super comfortable. And when they wore out, we bought another pair!
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Thongs!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these thongs! They are super comfortable. The padding on the foot bed make me feel like I am walking on air. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is they were not wide enough for my feet (but that is not unusual). I do recommend these flip flops! Great for working around the house or running to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Stacdg

customer_reviews.title: My normal size fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8 1/2 regular width, and that is what I ordered. They fit perfectly and are SUPER comfortable. They are my house slippers/running errands sandals and I can wear them all day without problems. I have zero arches and heel spurs so I often have foot pain when wearing flat shoes, but not with these.
customer_reviews.author: Bird That FlewTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A decent knockoff ...but no cigar
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my Nike flip flops today...my favorite summer shoes. Problem is these are definitely Not Nike’s. I plan to keep them and wear them, they seem fairly comfortable and I have a new puppy so I won’t be nearly as upset when he chews them up. But Buyer Beware, probably a decent shoe (yea, I shoulda known because of the price, I know) but NOT Nike
customer_reviews.author: wimsecalgal

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for most part
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected for the most part. i and my family have ordered this shoe over and over and over...LOL. but this time the shoe size is a DAB SMALLER than other shoes I have purchased in this size.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Makes tiny air fart noises with every step! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes tiny air fart noises with every step! I return them after one where cuz I couldn't stand it anymore. Luckily the seller was very accommodating im processing the return
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Update to an Old Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these Nike flip-flops for years, I've had two previous pairs and they were comfortable, durable and supportive. I lost my most recent pair at the beach and re-ordered them on Amazon. The flip-flops that just arrived are nothing like my previous pairs, they are cheap quality, different materials, and really tight/hard to get on my foot. They are going back and I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Nunn

customer_reviews.title: this item did not last 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: The thong piece near the top of the left shoe is separating and it's only been less than 4 months. They are comfortable but are obviously of shoddy construction. The previous pair I purchased lasted two years but these are different from the old model shoe. The company making the shoes must have changed or the materials are now of much cheaper quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even make it one summer with these and the part between your toe looked like it was hanging on by a thread. My old ones were great but the last 2 pair I have bought have done the same thing with the thong part.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kuster

customer_reviews.title: Sizes not standard
customer_reviews.text: I'm confused with this: I have the EXACT same thing and and same size so I felt safe ordering another color online. But they are too small. Unfortunately I will have to return them or exchange them. Side note to anyone with rheumatoid arthritis, these are great when you are experiencing flare ups in your feet and you can't get shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior4justice

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfy but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightness of the foam, but they're not as durable as the old style with harder rubber. They're comfy like my old style ones, but these ones are LOUD! Walking down the hallway sounds like farting noises. Kind of embarrassing because it announces your presence regardless of how you walk in the shoes. Only downside...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: safer and comfier than flimsy flip flops - but size up!
customer_reviews.text: The toe piece seems like it will come loose eventually, but the bottom is very comfortable. Size up, I normally wear 6.5-7 and had to get an 8! They squeak a little on tile floor, but other than that I love these. I bought them as a safer flip-flop than the cheap flimsy ones after a severe ankle sprain, they are much more sturdy and less likely to let you step wrong and injure yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not the same
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several pairs of these sandals over the years because they have been extremely comfortable. However, this last pair I ended up returning. They were much lighter, more cheaply made. The memory foam was thinner, not as supportive. The piece between your toes was made of rougher material and was uncomfortable. Overall, just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Mom on the Run

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nike pair similar to these that are 2 years old and are time to be thrown out. So I bought these. They are horrible. Do not run the same size. I normally wear the same size in all of Nike shoes and these are way too small! They are not as cushioned as the others either. Returning them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Comfortable. I had a pair that the toe strap pulled out of the sole (had them for a year and wore them almost 24/7 minus sleeping). I cried and then ordered another pair. Took a day to arrive. Had to wear other shoes, which made my ankles and calves hurt. I'm back in these for the first time today and I can't tell you how much I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Zuch

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I loved my punch and grey ones until the toe piece broke. I wear an 8 but need a 9 in these. They’re the most comfortable flip flops even during pregnancy with swollen feet. If they get stinky just wash with your clothes and set out to dry. This is my third pair.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are much different from previous Nike athletic sandals ...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are much different from previous Nike athletic sandals i have bought. They are very cheaply made, and I cannot understand why they would cost more than $20 tops. I would not get them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: The strap breaks! Bring back the  old style!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the old style Nike Ultra Comfort Sandals. Loved loved loved them. Had a pair that lasted forever. Then they changed the style, and the toe strap broke after 4 months. Hm. A fluke? So I ordered another pair. Again, the toe strap broke in the same place after about 3 months. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: I lost my favorite pair of Nike Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I lost my favorite pair of Nike Sandals. They were more padded than these. These are okay, but the others were better. I just couldn't fine them on line. I have small feet, and although these fit fine, the others were kids shoes, but I just couldn't fin any exactly like them.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible heel design. Backwards rock!!
customer_reviews.text: It is soft comfortable not support comfortable. I really dislike the heel of the shoe. It has a roll to the back of the heel. I got them for house slippers and feel unsafe wearing them. The shoes make you feel like you are going to rock backwards to the point of falling. This is a no go for me with wanting to wear them as a house shoe while caring for a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the low quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the low quality. I compared my old with my new and the older ones are slightly larger. I have been wearing this sandal/thong for many years and have loved them until now...too bad Nike decided to decrease the quality of their product. I will search for a new manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nike Thongs
customer_reviews.text: The length of the thong is great! The width and length of the strap is a bit small. I think another inch on the width and about half an inch on the strap would do the job. But I can stretch the strap out for now. I do love the look and feel of the thong. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ZK

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CUSHIONING
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED THIS SLIPPER FROR MY SISTER WHO HAS ISSUES WITH HER FEET. ANY PRESSURE FROM UNDER THE FEET HURTS HER AND IT BREAKS MY HEART. SHE HAS WORN THESE SLIPPERS OVER THE YEARS AND WE USED TO PURCHASE IT IN THE NIKE STORES BUT SOMEHOW FOR THE PAST TWO YEARS THEY DIDNT HAVE IT. I ORDERED THROUGH AMAZON AND THE SERVICE WAS GREAT AND MY SISTER NOW HAS A SMILE ON HER FACE AGAIN. SHE SAYS SHE FEELS LIKE SHES FLOATING IN THE AIR. IM VERY HAPPR WITH THE PRODUCT AND WOULD BUY IT OVER AND OVER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Masuma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got the black/white one (its mostly all black) and LOVE IT! I had these before in a different color and they lasted a LONG time, I'm talking about YEARS. These are stylish, comfortable, couldn't be more happier.
customer_reviews.author: Persad

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal- buying another pair...i hope!
customer_reviews.text: Would like to buy again but unsure what size; writing this review in hopes in says what size I bought when posted. Yes, I want another pair - that should tell you how much I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Jess C. Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than one season
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Loved these flip flops previously; have worn them for year. However, this pair/current manufacture is substandard. Material between toes is ripping after only four months of wear. I like old style of the Nike flip flops, not current.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: that is a Lloyd more comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the white and black version... that is a Lloyd more comfortable... these run a tiny bit smaller than that pair....and the edge where the pink meets the black plastic is rough and rubs my foot when I walk... will have to try and break it in and hope that softens up.
customer_reviews.author: AFoote

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: They broke in less than two months. The whole strap broke. These were not the original design I've purchased in years past and it shows. I wouldn't recommend wasting your money. 1st time ive ever had a problem with a Nike product
customer_reviews.author: Tar

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but run small.
customer_reviews.text: They run small, I had to return for next size up but they are very very comfortable and light weight. I am very happy with them, I bought 2 pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: Loving these!
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Nike. Great pair of flops. Have worn them marathon shopping and they're by FAR the most comfortable pair I've owned since my last pair of Nike brand flops. Feet feel and look great in them. No bad slippage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia H.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandal I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a 5.5 or 6 in other shoes (heels, etc.), but I wear a 7 in this Nike sandal. It is the most comfortable sandal I've ever worn! I have purchased this sandal in multiple colors and I absolutely love them. Hopefully they continue to make these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: CAK1124

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 surgeries on the bottom of my foot and this is my go to shoe. When I am at home or out and about, I wear this sandal. I am probably on my 5th pair of them over the last 10 years. They are definitely worth the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: momof3sons

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant transaction
customer_reviews.text: The order was made and the item received very promptly! These are the most comfortable thongs sandals I have ever had! Going to order another pair so I don't run out when these bite the dust!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian M. Moir

customer_reviews.title: My go to summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have to have a pair of these in my closet every summer - HAVE TO - so easy to put on super comfy cushion soles no slip straps - they rock
customer_reviews.author: Ell

customer_reviews.title: Makes feet hurt
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before from khols and they were fine. After wearing these for a few days by feet hurt SO bad. The right side of my right foot was in alot of pain. I'm currently walking with a limp.
customer_reviews.author: REINA FOSTER

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Nike
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are super comfy and look great! But I've only worn for 3 months (only after work) so a few hours a day and they are breaking down in the heel and make a weird air sound when I walk....I'm 5'3 and weigh 128 so maybe the Swoooosh sound is now a Nike trademark sound..... : ( so very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Waltersd

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best ever. My daughter absolutely loves them! I bought her a pair at a resale shop but they got eaten by the dog so I had to buy her these. She loves them. Worth every freaking penny!
customer_reviews.author: Callamina Synth

customer_reviews.title: Nike womans sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Not the Nike 3, which I returned. Thank you so much. I will buy these again, as long as you carry them.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona C.

customer_reviews.title: My go to house flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Yup, these are house flip flops only .. lol Never wear them outside. Fit is pretty good (I'm an 8.5 & sized up to a 9). Super comfortable and I love the black bottom .. shows less dirt although I have been known to throw these in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: MonicaP

customer_reviews.title: These start to smell when sweat, water, etc get on them (cushion pads)
customer_reviews.text: These start to smell so easily when you get them wet. Can't wear them much without them smelling and scared to wash because they might break. Don't recommend, buy the plastic Nike ones instead these are too expensive for the lack of time you get to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: JEP

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT, FIT, STYLE
customer_reviews.text: These are a staple in my "flip flop" collection. They are the most comfortable flips I've ever bought- no matter the price. I vary between sizes 6-6.5.... and with these (and most flips) I order a size 6 because they usually fit perfect and still fit just right after a lot of wear'n'tear. I can't rave about these specific NIKE flips enough. If comfort and simple style is important then your summer feet need these!!! (THEY LAST FOREVER) cheers- Kerry
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I once lucked onto a pair on sale really cheaply at a local store and had been looking to replace them. These are very comfortable for hard surfaced floors, such as tile.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These were to be a replacement for the Nike flip flops that I have been wearing for years and about worn out. These were cheap; not near the quality of my old ones (and twice as expensive). I might as well have gone to the dollar store. I was really disappointed and returned them. Going to look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shobiz99

customer_reviews.title: Great go-to summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these amazing summer shoes. They have redesigned the soles - they used to be more sneaker-like - but they feel just the same on streets and floors. I haven't compared them on trails yet, but that's not where I wear them most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: LynneKLR

customer_reviews.title: Skip them if you can...
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the worst I’ve bought. For the price you would expect a long life of the product. Nope. They lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jesilyn83

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair of these flip-flops. The first pair I loved and wore for about two years until I just had to get a new pair. This next pair sounded a little funny when I walked on them. Like they weren’t made exactly the same way. Sadly I just sat down on the couch and the toe strap of the flip-flop just broke. I should have gone with my gut that these weren’t of the same quality as the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: SWG

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased from Kohl's seems to be a little bit better quality. Not sure why but if you do ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Nike flip flops and the other pair that I purchased from Kohl's seems to be a little bit better quality. Not sure why but if you do go with these flip-flops you need to buy a size up then what you wear because they fit somewhat small.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just run small.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter for her birthday and she loved them, but they just ran small. Need to re-order them and a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Liked the colors
customer_reviews.text: Liked the colors, but the stitching on the underside of the top caused a 2 1/2" welt the first & only time I wore them. It's been over z month & my foot still has a red mark on it that looks like a scar.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L

customer_reviews.title: Get more again
customer_reviews.text: The best thong flip flops ever. Wish I could get them again. No longer selling the type. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Mstricee007

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. The style has changed a little from the previous design, but they fit well. They provide a cushion for walking which I appreciate due to foot problems. These are the only kind of flip flops I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cari R Wheat

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this in 8.5, normally I wear an 8. The 8.5 fits good.I wear it around the house as for some reason walking barefoot hurts my feet now. They are a bit expensive for a thong but you are paying for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe, the problem I am having could just be that I am hard on them.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd or 4th pair. My first pair lasted for years. Now they are lasting three of four months. I live in a place, and travel to places out of the country that do not have sidewalks, like most people are used to in the lower 48 states. For comfort and stability in this type of shoe, I give it 100% satisfaction. But they keep breaking on the left foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D Himphill

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8 and had to return because they were waaaaay too small. I usually wear a 7.5. Also, woulda been smart to remove the price tag saying they are worth half what they are being sold for.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: While they are comfortable, the soles don't seem as durable as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking for the Nike Comfort, but unfortunately they were out of stock. I came across these and decided to order. While they are comfortable, the soles don't seem as durable as the ones I was looking for, as they are foam soles. With that being said, I don't feel these are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: jamer1

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sandals. I have gotten them before.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The only thing with buying through Marketplace is you usually have to pay for shipping. Doesn't go through "Prime".
customer_reviews.author: meak

customer_reviews.title: Less cushion, less stable sole than original model
customer_reviews.text: This thing used to be made much much nicer. I’m a bit disappointed in the new style. It’s flimsier and more plasticky with far less cushioning. Still I kept them for beach use only. The old model was so comfortable,And cushioned, I could wear them all day doing errands . It’s a shame they couldn’t leave well enough alone.....
customer_reviews.author: neil d gitnick

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive. Poor quality/won’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 9 months. Lost cushiony feel with 1-2 months. This is the third pair I’ve bought and they keep getting worse. First pair lasted 4 years, 2nd pair lasted 1.5 years. And now just 9 month. Nike’s slacking.... I contacted Nike but they said it was normal wear. These are crap shoes which bums me out since I would keep buying them if they actually lasted.
customer_reviews.author: KFry

customer_reviews.title: Small and uncomfortable. Cute color though!
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow, sizing is a whole size smaller than expected. I could feel the stitching in the fabric and the plastic sole was digging into my feet. Not what I had hoped when I ordered them. Even my 14 year old didn't like them and were small on her as well. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: KyMarieC

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfy enough, but they seem to run small and are very flimsy feeling for the price paid. I found a much nicer pair (still Nike if you care about brand) at Walmart for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rhapsody

customer_reviews.title: Very light but not the quality of my old ones
customer_reviews.text: They are not as good quality as I’ve bought in the past. I’ve worn the Nike sandals for years, these don’t seem to hold up like the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Y. Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not the same quality as older versions. Very uncomfortable. Your foot sinks right to the sole that’s a cheap material not a solid leather/comfortable sole. But they are cute so if your stick with them they at least look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cate R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought what I thought was the same style (and got the same size). These are slightly shorter. They are okay and I kept them because I love the memory foam footbed and I was afraid a bigger size would be way to big.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Poorly-made Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month since my purchase and these are falling apart. I don't even wear them daily! The "thong" part of the right sandal is so stretched and worn that the shoe is falling off my foot. I'm a size 6 shoe, weigh 135 lbs. No excuse for this inferior quality!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are a big improvement over previous years of the same type. It was a little small compared to the same size from the previous year but I might just need to go up half a size. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Price

customer_reviews.title: A major drop in quality from the old style
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of the original Comfort slides for years. But when my last pair needed replacing, I got the Ultra Comfort instead. Big mistake! These feel flimsy and cheap, and the sizing was slightly off. They felt like cheap flip flops, not the quality product they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Lili W

customer_reviews.title: The BEST flip flops ever!
customer_reviews.text: I got the pink & black as a gift and loved them so much I wanted the black and white. They are true to size and made well. They are so comfy and my feet feet always feel great in them. I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Pee

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you're looking for......
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are cute and cushy but lack the support that I want. It feels like I'm walking on lightweight pillows. They also feel a tiny bit small. I always wear a size 7 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nana1

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace a pair I had for over five years. These are just as comfy but the quality is not the same. The soles also make a “sucking” noise when walking if the surface is wet
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: Best Flip Flop Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are just TOO comfortable! :) The firm support and cushion as well as the non-abrasive thong make this the perfect flip flop. I literally wear them every day, even if it's just to dash out to the mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Run too small
customer_reviews.text: They run small. 7’s fit like a 6.5. I’m returning for a size bigger. So disappointed because they feel really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia H

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE SANDALS
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable sandals that fit as expected and look just fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bates

customer_reviews.title: That was a good idea for the length of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I ordered a size bigger. That was a good idea for the length of the shoe, but they are super wide. I'm 9m pregnant and have swollen feet and these still are wide on me.
customer_reviews.author: Cstat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and withstand getting wet a lot, the best
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable ever, I find myself putting these on to do everything and they wear so well and even hold up after being wet, many times, love them
customer_reviews.author: jeremy191

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product for the price, looked dirty when they arrived. I question if they were actually Nike such poor quality. Returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Carter

customer_reviews.title: Summer Must Haves
customer_reviews.text: I wear these every summer as casual flip flops and especially around the pool, and love the support and cushion they offer.
customer_reviews.author: AJL1213

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better!
customer_reviews.text: Pink color started coming off after two months of use. I expected better quality from Nike product
customer_reviews.author: Rubina S.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These run small. The seller approved me returning them but the shipping would have cost half what I paid for them so I will just to find someone that wants them. Returning doesn’t seem worth it. Order at least half size up.
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: Broke after six weeks
customer_reviews.text: At exactly six weeks the thong broke from the footbed. It's two weeks past the return deadline. Before that, they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: EsqTitling

product_meta.title: NIKE Women's Ultra Comfort Thong Sandal
product_meta.description: Women's Ultra Comfort Thong is a lightweight sandal to slip on anytime. Its synthetic leather upper is durable and its foam midsole provides a nice, cushioned footbed.
feature_bullets: Thong construction provides a secure, comfortable fit
Dual-density foam midsole offers plush underfoot comfort
Synthetic leather upper offers premium durability
